Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to increasing the excelsior research and development tax credit
Summary: Increases the excelsior research and development tax credit maximum from six to twenty percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง355, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to increasing the excelsior research and development tax credit
